metadata.Title: CVE-2021-22004 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in SaltStack Salt before 3003.3. The salt minion installer will accept and use a minion config file at C:\salt\conf if that file is in place before the installer is run. This allows for a malicious actor to subvert the proper behaviour of the given minion software.

criterions.comment: salt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
